body:
Hey, I recently created a short video of tips for the basics of pvp. Before you click off this post, watch the video. You will learn something new I can almost guarantee.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z32Ybf4FYL0

Thanks for watching, I hope you learned something!

title: Lego's Pvp Tips And Tricks
